Am I showing off? Or am I keeping order, and trying to stop mass ooC 
posts? Clearly moderating the next person who made an offending post 
worked for the moment. Since you have an email address (obviously), 
I'm pretty sure you are capable of emailing privately, and thus 
not "be an ass" over the group. =)

The council has long threatened to moderate people for posting too 
many OOC's. We chose not to do that because it disrupts the flow of 
the RPG. We've been patient and lenient, but something needs to be 
done. And something was done. You are entitled to your opinion, but 
generally speaking, why should we listen to you? You rarely post, 
and when you have posted, they were ooC's. In fact, only TWO POSTS 
of your last SEVENTEEN were IC. I'd say that you are no more helping 
the problem than Narrator was. Although I regret what I did, 
necessity brings action.

Now, as I mentioned, you have a private email and so do I. So, if 
you wish to discuss whether what I did was correct or incorrect 
email me. And DON'T email the group. That's what the messageboard on 
the website is for.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeepers Creepers" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> OOC:  Really, rauq, you don't need to try and show off and be 
Mr."I'm a
> council member so I have to be an ass" over the group.
